channel.title: Price Tags on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Price Tags on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Switching Labels
item.description: [big]Recently I had two pretty good six-packs of beer for $3.99 each. I had scored a deal because I wasn’t picky—the beers were rebranded by a grocery store to celebrate a special event that happened months prior, but the tell was on the cap—these beers, despite the labels, had been brewed by a well-known local craft brewer, and were the same beers that were in the “beer cave” for seven dollars more.
